<h2>Test Race</h2>

<table><tr><td bgcolor='$!data.voicecolor'><i>Once you've chosen a colour, you decide how 
much of the money you have earned you will bet, and how much you will invest
into lowering your engine's stall rate. Click on the slider scale and move
it around to see how the values change.  Note that in this test race, unlike in the real races,
what you select here will have NO IMPACT on anything.
</i></td></tr></table>
